title: Incorrect branching information in HadGEM3-GC31-LL RFMIP piClim-hist* r2i1p1f3 and r3i1p1f3 simulations
description: The branch_date_in_parent field in these datasets is set to 1850-01-01 rather than 1860-01-01 for all r2i1p1f3 simulations and 1870-01-01 for all r3i1p1f3 simulations. In addition these simulations were initialised with data from the HadGEM3-GC31-LL piClim-control simulation rather than the piControl simulation as required by the experiment definitions.
